name: AI_SetCondition_OnCreatureInRange
documentation: Sets the given condition of the given player based on diplomacy (optionally) and humans (optionally only soldiers) around a given point.

parameters.name: EverActive
numberHint: Resets the condition back to false when read.

parameters.name: OnlyEnemy
parameters.documentation: Condition only matches if diplomatic relationship to THIS player is enemy.

parameters.name: DiplomacyState
parameters.documentation: Condition only matches if soldiers are detected.
